DESCRIPTION: Vote for the bot to get amazing rewards!
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}upvote** ~ Get the link to upvote Gamer bot. Creates a reminder for you every 12 hours to vote again so you can unlock amazing rewards.
